General.Name: Nusa Palapa Gemilang PT Tbk
General.Description: PT Nusa Palapa Gemilang Tbk engages in manufacturing of micro nutrient compound fertilizers in Indonesia. It produces and sells NPK fertilizer and microgranule fertilizer. The company also offers micro fertilizer nutrimix GT, CCF fertilizer ferticote, B-fert, and NPK fertilizer ferticomp. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Raya Surabaya Mojokerto Km 39, Sidoarjo, Indonesia
